```{js echo=FALSE}

var raw_id_modals = [];
getElements_from_array('.array_id_modals', raw_id_modals);
// console.log("here: " + raw_id_modals);

// Get all the elements store in an array and push it to array name
function getElements_from_array (class_name, array_name){
    document.querySelectorAll(class_name).forEach(item => {
      item_cleaned = item.textContent.trim();
      array_name.push(item_cleaned);
    });
}

var currentUrl = window.location.href;
var index_hashtag = currentUrl.lastIndexOf("#");

// If there is no # then result is -1
if (index_hashtag > -1){

  // Plus 1 to avoid getting the # symbol
  var filename1 = currentUrl.substr(index_hashtag+1);
  // console.log(`the filename: ${filename1} include: ${raw_id_modals.includes(filename1)}`)
  // console.log("typeof: " + typeof filename1)

  // If the name of the url is in the id modals then open modal
  // this is useful when sharing links
  if (raw_id_modals.includes(filename1)){
    var mobileModal = new bootstrap.Modal(document.getElementById(filename1));
    mobileModal.show();
  }
}

```
